settings.title: Pili and Elemi Oils Blended With Botanicals
settings.text: Make sure you have aromatherapy on-the-go so you can conquer whatever life throws at you! When paired with other delightful essential oils, Elemi and Pili Oil create a potent and rare product that your body and mind will love. Not a morning person? Kick-start the day with Cinnamon Fest. Do you desire a restful sleep before tackling the day tomorrow? Quiet your mind with Sweet Dreams before hitting the sack. If you want them all, prepare for the morning, night, and everything in between with our Essential Oil Collection that features our five unique oil blends to help you feel your best.

settings.title: Ready-To-Use Aromatherapy Oils
settings.text: Our sleek, ready-to-use roll-on oils are easy to take with you wherever you go. You can slip them into your pocket, purse, or backpack and pull them out for a quick application whenever you need them most. Not only will you be breathing in eucalyptus, lavender, juniper, or citronella, but your skin will absorb the antioxidants and anti-inflammatory properties of our potent Elemi and Pili Oils. You can get the burst of energy or relaxation you need while simultaneously hydrating and restoring your skin. Available in the US nationwide. Shop our Essential Oils today!
